As a local chapter of R-Ladies Global, we promote gender diversity in the R community in Vienna and worldwide. We aim to provide a safe and inclusive community space for R enthusiasts and practitioners of all experience levels with the R programming language, prioritizing anyone identifying as a minority gender to achieve proportionate gender representation. ðŸŒˆ
